ValidationRule.description: Opportunities to Refer - Last 12 Months, Pay Providers Referred - Last 12 Months, Top Recommended Payroll Provider and # of Clients You Process Payroll For must be filled in to Profile a CPA
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), ISPICKVAL(Outcome__c,'Profiled'), OR( ISBLANK(Opportunities_to_Refer_Last_12_Months__c), ISBLANK(Pay_Providers_Referred_Last_12_Months__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Preferred_Method__c)), ISBLANK(Number_of_Payroll_Clients__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunities to Refer - Last 12 Months, Pay Providers Referred - Last 12 Months, Top Recommended Payroll Provider and # of Clients You Process Payroll For must be filled in to Profile a CPA
